metadata.synopsis: This dialogue can occur in three different states: In the first, Tahani is in a trance, chanting a spell that will cover the druid grove in thorns. In the second, the ritual has been stopped after a druid named Kagha was exposed as a Shadow Druid. Tahani is furious that players stopped the ritual - even though Kagha had ulterior motives, Tahani still believes her path was best and that players had no right to intervene.In the third, a group of goblins that had threatened the grove has been dealt with and the grove is considered safe again. In this state, Tahani isn't convinced the threat is really over. She thinks her fellow druids will lead them down the same path again, taking pity on people that will only bring trouble to their door.The player always encounters Inwe around a sacred druid pool. She's more or less the xenophobic conservative of the chanting druids.

1.speaker: Tahan
1.text: Aggeniculamur in umbra tua, Pater Arborum.
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Eyes closed, focused on the chant, channelling magical energy.NodeContext: Chanting a magic spell: AH-jeh-nee-koo-lah-moor een OOM-brah TWO-ah, PAH-tehr ARR-bore-oom.

2.speaker: Tahan
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Eyes closed, focused on the chant, channelling magical energy.NodeContext: Chanting a magic spell: Een OOM-brahm CRAY-toose, sahn-GWEE-neh ee-you-RAH-toose.

3.speaker: Tahan
3.text: Hostes subeunt. Protege nos. Muni nos.
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Eyes closed, focused on the chant, channelling magical energy.NodeContext: Chanting a magic spell: HO-stess soo-BAY-uhnt. PRO-teh-jay nohs. MOO-nee nohs.

5.speaker: Tahan
5.text: You think you saved us? You just prolonged the inevitable.
5.context: NodeContext: The ritual has stopped and the goblin threat against the grove is dealt with, but she believes something similar will happen again so long as her fellow druids let outsiders in.

4.speaker: Tahan
4.text: Sooner or later, other outsiders will bring trouble to the grove.
4.context: NodeContext: The ritual has stopped and the goblin threat against the grove is dealt with, but she believes something similar will happen again so long as her fellow druids let outsiders in.

7.speaker: Tahan
7.text: I've got nothing to say to you, outsider.
7.context: NodeContext: Dismissive/angry. Defiant. The ritual that would have sealed off the grove has been stopped, but she doens't think it should have been.

8.speaker: Tahan
8.text: Kagha was right. We must put ourselves first.
8.context: NodeContext: Defiant. The ritual that would have sealed off the grove has been stopped, but she doens't think it should have been.

0.speaker: Tahan
0.text: She's dead because of your meddling.
0.context: NodeContext: She's pissed at the player for killing Kagha, even though she sided with evil shadow druids.

6.speaker: Tahan
6.text: You had no right to intervene. You're not one of us.
6.context: InternalNodeContext: DEN_ShadowDruid_Event_SaghaTurnedGoodNodeContext: She's pissed at the player. Defiant. The ritual that would have sealed off the grove has been stopped, but she doens't think it should have been.

9.speaker: Tahan
9.text: Complexum tuum, ab terra ortum, ad nos defer.
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Eyes closed, focused on the chant, channelling magical energy.NodeContext: Chanting a magic spell: Com-PLECK-soom TOO-oom, ahb TEH-rah ohr-TOOM, ahd nohs dee-FEHR.

10.speaker: Tahan
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Eyes closed, focused on the chant, channelling magical energy.NodeContext: Chanting a magic spell: Ahb SPEE-ree-too oo-MOHK, AH-coo-lay-oos VEE-tees-kway.

11.speaker: Tahan
11.text: This will happen again. We won't have you to rescue us when it does.
11.context: NodeContext: She's bitter. 'Rescue' is said almost sarcastically. The ritual has stopped and the goblin threat against the grove is dealt with, but she believes something similar will happen again so long as her fellow druids let outsiders in.

12.speaker: Tahan
12.text: Defende nos ab imminentibus aequilibrio tuo.
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Eyes closed, focused on the chant, channelling magical energy.NodeContext: Chanting a magic spell: deh-FEN-day nohs ahb ee-mee-NEN-tee-booce AI-kwee-lee-bree-oh TWO-oh.
